title.rendered: Cape Town vs Durban, South Africa T20 League: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Cape Town: Rassie van der Dussen, Grant Roelofsen (wk), Dewald Brevis, Ryan Rickelton, Delano Potgieter, George Linde, Sam Curran, Rashid Khan (c), Duan Jansen, Olly Stone, Jofra Archer

Durban: Quinton de Kock (c & wk), Kyle Mayers, Matthew Breetzke, Heinrich Klaasen, Prenelan Subrayen, Jason Holder, Wiaan Mulder, Dwaine Pretorius, Keshav Maharaj, Akila Dananjaya, Keemo Paul

Pitch Report

Venue: Newlands, Cape Town

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 171

2nd innings average score: 196

Wickets per innings: 4

Type: Excellent for batting

Weather: Slightly cloudy but no rain is forecast during the game

Wins

Batting 1st: —

Batting 2nd: 100%

Fantasy Tips of the Day

In the last 3 games at the venue, the top order generated the most fantasy points.

Bowlers from the team batting second produced more points than the team batting first.

Batting in the second innings becomes easier. The chasing teams have attained the target at an average run rate of 9.8.

Rassie van der Dussen’s numbers at Cape Town make a good reading. He has scored 472 runs at an average of 47 and a strike rate of 129 in 14 outings.

Besides adding 605 runs in 23 games at the venue, Quinton de Kock has 14 dismissals to his name.

Prenelan Subrayen is the only player from both teams to feature in the Ultimate Team in the last 5 T20 games.

Given the pitch favours batters, picking more all-rounders is likely to keep fantasy players in the hunt. In fact, both teams have plenty in their armoury.
